Package org.codehaus.preon.el

The public API of Limbo.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Binding The interface implemented by objects capable of creating a ReferenceContext from a class passed in.
Descriptive The interface to be implemented by objects capable of describing itself using an object passed in.
Document The interface implemented by objects receiving the human-readable representation of an Expression.
Expression<R,C> An object encapsulating an expression, with the ability to evaluate itself against an external context, and the ability to describe itself against a certain external context.
Expressions.BoundExpressionBuilder<C> An expression builder that has already been tied to a ReferenceContext.
Expressions.ContextualizedExpressionBuilder<C>  
Reference<E> A reference to an Object, based on an environment of type E.
ReferenceContext<E> A context for building references to elements in an environment of E.
 

Class Summary
BooleanLiteralReference<E> Reference to boolean literal values.
Expressions A convenience class for creating Expressions.
ImplicitsContext<E> A context that 'imports' constant references such as true and false.

Exception Summary
BindingException The exception thrown when the expression cannot be bound to a context.
InvalidExpressionException The exception thrown when a String cannot be interpreted as a Limbo expression.
 

Package org.codehaus.preon.el Description

The public API of Limbo. Limo is simple expression language offering support for regular arithmetic operators and boolean operators. Key difference with other existing expression languages is that Limbo tries to offer a rich expression language while preserving the ability to generate a human readable representation of the expression.

The key interface in Limbo is the Expression interface.
